metadata.title: PHOTOS: A "Catastrophic...Crippling...Paralyzing" Ice Storm
metadata.dek: More than 100,000 homes and businesses are without power as the storm rolls on.

byline.title: DC Senior Editorial Fellow
byline.short_bio: Before joining Mother Jones, Matt was a local reporter for the dearly departed Washington Examiner. He has also written for the New York Times, the Washington Post, Chicago Public Radio, and the Times of Trenton.
byline.end_of_article_bio: >Matt Connolly is the senior editorial fellow in Mother Jones' Washington, DC, bureau. For more of his stories, click

master_image.caption: A pedestrian battles the snow and cold wind as he crosses Wicker Street in Sanford, N.C.

photos.caption: A vehicle drives through the rapidly falling snow on the US 421 Bypass in Sanford, N.C.
LORETTA CANTRELL, 75, says "I feel like a child again playing in the snow," during a walk on Popular Stump Road in Helen, Ga.
